briefTitle: A Study of Paliperidone Palmitate 6-Month Formulation
officialTitle: Single-arm, Open-label Extension to a Double-blind, Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel-group Study of Paliperidone Palmitate 6-Month Formulation
summary: The main purpose of this study is to assess the long-term safety and tolerability of paliperidone 6-month PP6M (Dose 1 or Dose 2 \[milligram\] mg eq.) and to provide access to PP6M in participants with schizophrenia completing the R092670PSY3015 study without relapse.

effectByArm.arm: Total Paliperidone Palmitate 6-month (PP6M) 700 or 1000 mg eq.
